summary:
Mecca, officially Makkah, is a sacred city in Saudi Arabia, important to Muslims worldwide. It's where Islam's prophet Muhammad was born and received the Quran. The Great Mosque of Mecca, with the Ka'bah at its center, is Islam's holiest site. Every year, millions of Muslims perform the Hajj pilgrimage here.

The city has a rich history, but many historical sites have been destroyed to make way for modern buildings and to accommodate the growing number of pilgrims. Non-Muslims are not allowed to enter Mecca. It is governed by a municipal council and is part of the Mecca Province.
title: Mecca
